item.description:
One of our members and "resident" artists, Joanne Tarlin, invites you a unique Sunday event:

"Want to be immortalized? Come to my studio and bring a wish, dream, prayer etc. for inspiration for the future painting-mosaic, Community Dreams, which I'll begin in November. Choose a canvas, write your thoughts and then come to the exhibit of the finished piece in January."

There is no need to RSVP: you may but you can also just show up.  However, if folks would like to connect after the artistic event and get together afterwards let me know by email or post a message. I'm not certain that I will be able to make it on Sunday myself, but I can arrange the logistics if people are interested. Free parking next door for those visiting SoWa (at least last time that I checked) and it's Sunday (anyway) so I believe that on-street parking is free.

Joanne's contact info:
http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=208430305891392
www.joannesgallery.com
item.name: Metaphysical Fun: Turn your dreams and desires into a painting
